title: I recreated Bloodfury Renekton's splash art c:
body:
"Who's next on the chopping block?"
Finished Bloodfury {{champion:58}} , from the guy who painted {{champion:238}} , took me 50+ hours, glad it's finally done haha.
Next up: AstroNautilus 
Instargram: http://instagram.com/colourless_expressions
Reddit: http://www.reddit.com/…/i_recreated_bloodfury_renektons_sp…/
I have no intention of claiming the original artwork as mine (we all know Riot made Bloodfury {{champion:58}} ), I signed below in case others steal and distribute it.

replies.body:
Beautiful work. I really like all your other stuff as well :)

It's really awesome to see how you created it through the progression shots - those are super compelling and I personally love seeing that stuff.

Keep it up!
